cast.original_title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
cast.overview: The evil Darth Sidious enacts his final plan for unlimited power – and the heroic Jedi Anakin Skywalker must choose a side.
cast.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

details.biography:
He is best known for his classic line in Star Wars: Épisode II - L'attaque des clones(2002) - "This is a crisis!"

He was discovered by talent agents at a small coffee shop in his home town, who were flying in to film a low-budget movie about talent agents finding young faces in small coffee shops for high-budget movies.

His favorite color is blue. He says this is because wavelengths from 470-480nm are very pleasing to his eye.

- IMDb Mini Biography
details.name: David Bowers
